alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued September 01 at 1:54PM MDT until September 02 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...High temperatures in the upper 90s to low 100s expected. This will pose a moderate risk for heat-related illness. * WHERE...Potlatch, Pullman, La Crosse, Moses Lake, Lapwai, Odessa, Grand Coulee, Hayden, Colfax, Coulee Dam, Electric City, Othello, Kamiah, Peck, Spokane, Quincy, Wilbur, Creston, Winchester, Mohler, Plummer, Waha, Worley, Davenport, Harrington, Ephrata, Cheney, Rockford, Oakesdale, Tekoa, Rosalia, Ralston, Moscow, Uniontown, Culdesac, Lamona, Coeur d`Alene, Craigmont, Nezperce, Stratford, Post Falls, Ritzville, Coulee City, Genesee, Gifford, and Lewiston. * WHEN...From Noon to 8 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures will increase the risk for heat related illnesses, especially for those without efficient cooling or adequate hydration.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.

area.areaDesc: Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
